name: Boundless Ascension
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: [The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth. Please select your difficulty.]Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when h
